newsitem.title: USA: Leather Factory hires financial adviser.
newsitem.headline: Leather Factory hires financial adviser.

text.p: Leather Factory Inc said Friday it had hired Price Waterhouse LLP to assist it in restructuring its financing arrangements.

"We are pleased with this new Price Waterhouse relationship because we are confident that it will result in the restructuring of our financing arrangements on a favorable, long-term basis," Chairman, President and Chief Executive Wray Thompson said in a statement.
The company is to be assisted by Price Waterhouse's finance, recovery and disputes group, which Leather Factory's former chief financial officer John Tittle recently joined.
